about_the_game:
This is a cartoon casual action game with parkour as the main theme and challenges as the side quests.

easy to start but difficult to master. Players will take on the role of a cute and mischievous anthropomorphic fruit baby, running down the road while dodging obstacles that continuously appear ahead, and collecting coins and items to achieve higher scores and records. At the same time, coins and beans can be used to upgrade character abilities and unlock more challenging gameplay. In addition to parkour, the game offers interesting and challenging content. Join us now for a relaxing yet adventurous journey filled with challenges!

Mission System

Completing a mission earns corresponding rewards, and the mission will automatically refresh 20 minutes after completion. Uncompleted missions will refresh daily at midnight. You can also have the system remember your mission to avoid it refreshing automatically halfway through completion.

Challenge System

The game features a variety of mini-game challenges that can yield coins and beans, and there's also a chance (probability) to obtain score-doubling stars for parkour.

Embark on a relaxing and challenging adventure!

Item System

• Coins: The basic currency in the game, used for purchasing, upgrading, and unlocking characters, as well as challenging mini-games.

• Magnet: Automatically attracts coins along the way, improving collection efficiency.

• Flying Parachute: Allows the character to briefly fly, avoiding all ground obstacles and collecting coins in the air.

• Spirit: Protects the character from one collision damage, preventing the end of the game.

• Double Coins: Doubles the number of coins collected within a limited time.

Controls

• Controls: Use the A/D keys or ←→ arrow keys to control the character's left and right movements, dodging obstacles or collecting coins.

• Jump: Press the W key or ↑ arrow key to make the character jump. After obtaining items, you can also perform a double jump or more difficult jumping actions.

• Slide: Press the S key or ↓ arrow key to make the character roll and accelerate the descent.

Embark on a relaxing and challenging adventure!

name: Fruit Run: Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 0r AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Fruit Run: Challenge" is a casual action game with parkour as its core gameplay, complemented by challenge elements. The game is easy to get started, but difficult to master. Let's embark on this adventure filled with challenges!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
